<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Paralytic Shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2285)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A two-pronged metal rod, this wand has a handle coated in thick rubber. Each prong ends in a copper coil. When Activated, the wand produces a loud zapping sound.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_paralyze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=213), electrocuting the target into immobility. Each target takes electricity damage at the start of its turns while it remains [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) or [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) due to the spell. The amount of damage depends on the wand's type.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _paralyze_ of the appropriate rank.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
